pages.text: A Spooky Amulet that increases the damage inflicted by Soul Skulls instead of Fangs. Instead of Sharpness, the amulet takes Power, Punch and Flame Enchantments.
Power increases the Damage dealt if the Skull directly hits a creature, Punch increases the Explosive Radius of the Skull and Flame makes the Skull set the creature or surroundings on Fire.
